price: 15. Kasi soki atiki te, tokokanga ye na elongi naye.
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
